alert.note: Alert for Caldwell; Grant; La Salle; Winn (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 22 at 9:37AM CDT until further notice by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following river in Louisiana... Little River Of Louisiana Near Rochelle affecting Caldwell, Winn, La Salle and Grant Parishes. For the Little River Of Louisiana...including Rochelle...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Little River Of Louisiana Near Rochelle. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 35 feet, Expect considerable lowland flooding of hunting camps. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:30 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 21.7 feet. - Forecast...The Little River is expected to rise above flood stage early Thursday afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 34 feet Saturday evening. - Flood stage is 32 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=shv The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1115 AM CDT.
